name: habit-bot
description: A personal health tracking system using Ecological Momentary Assessment (EMA) to capture behaviors and outcomes in real-time.

scripts.eval:category: cd evals && npx promptfoo eval -c promptfooconfig.yaml
scripts.eval:extraction: cd evals && npx promptfoo eval -c extraction.yaml
scripts.eval:questions: cd evals && npx promptfoo eval -c questions.yaml
scripts.eval:all: npm run eval:category && npm run eval:extraction && npm run eval:questions
scripts.eval:cache-clear: cd evals && npx promptfoo cache clear
